data.message: There you go again, sipping suds and promoting alcohol again! Don't get me wrong; you got to be young and stupid to become old and wise... but you make money off it to buy more! You might be proof of a best friend by drinking yourself to death! Which would be a pity because your music is evolving into something worth listening to! Chin chin ole boy, cuz you'd be a bigger success if you weren't such an arsehole!

replies.message: Before finding the balance, it must go through the stages, make mistakes, learn from them and retransmit.
